<br>

We are delighted to announce the next annual workshop of the joint working group “Adaptive Designs and Multiple Testing Procedures” of the German (DR) and the Austrian-Swiss (ROeS) Regions of the International Biometric Society (IBS).

**Where:** Newcastle upon Tyne (in-person only).

**When:** The workshop will run from 2nd to 3rd June 2026 with pre-conference courses on 1st June 2026.


**Short course:** There will be pre-workshop short courses on <ul> <li>*Practitioner’s View of Adaptive Designs* and </li>  <li>*Designing better trials: Advanced randomization methods for modern clinical research*</li> on 1st June 2026, see [**here**](https://admtp.github.io/ADMTP2026/course.html). </ul>

**Abstract submission:** Abstract submissions will start from mid September 2025.

**Registration:** Registration will open from January 5, 2026.

**Scientific Committee:** Satrajit Roychoudhury (Pfizer), Alex Sverdlov (Novartis), Hongjian Zhu (Systimmune), Rahul Bhattacharya (Department of Statistics, University of Calcutta).

**Organising Committee:** [Ayon Mukherjee](mailto: ayon.mukherjee@lilly.com) (Eli Lilly), [Aritra Mukherjee](mailto:aritra.mukherjee@newcastle.ac.uk) (PHSI, Newcastle University) , [James Wason](mailto:james.wason@newcastle.ac.uk) (PHSI, Newcastle University).

**Contact:** If you have any questions about the workshop, please e-mail [Aritra Mukherjee](mailto:aritra.mukherjee@newcastle.ac.uk).
